message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $12,000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the most value while also allowing me to maximize the return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction.
